name: Crystal Hunt (EmperorScorpion)
description:
Features

Explore an unknown island and gather crystals. Why are you here? How did you get there? Why are you doing this? Find out.

Gameplay

You control Vaalkal, a man. Or is he? You don't know? All you know is that you must collect Enchanted Velour crystals on the island of Glet. Who knows, you might even figure out what Velour crystals are and why are they here.

Controls

Standard first person contols:

W - Move forward

S - Move backward

A - Move left

D - Move right

Space - Jump

Credits

Lead developer and programer : Alen Brebrić.

This project was presented for a game jam with a theme of "Collect" for educational program "INKUBATOR - PISMO"  for "Unity/C# game developer".
